name: Depths of Dread
description: There is something unusual about the source of monsters coming from the depths below. Having been summoned by the king to investigate a dungeon beneath an old abandoned town, you are to put together a team that will purge the dungeon of evil before it spreads and consumes the land.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 270 MB available space Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
recommended_requirements: Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50), iOS 8.0, Android 4.4.4*
